name: Dr. Doyle's Musings
description:
Dr. Doyle, PhD is a calculus professor, but like every human, he enjoys a healthy set of hobbies. 

Painting is one of his favorite leisure activities, but as every Professor, his mind is always racing back and forth.

One evening Dr. Doyle, was sitting in his living-room, meditating which color should finalize his latest and greatest painting.

CONTROLS:Movement (on PC)Arrow KeysMovement (on Mobile)Swipe to direction

Made for 'One Room' (Bitsy Game Jam) ! 

Theme: "One Room"

Limitations: Making a project based around one Room, or inside a Room.

Using Bitsy by @adamledoux

Enjoy your space-time-continuum ;)

- by Toxworks
